headline: Is Sempra’s Clean Energy Focus Justifying Its Share Price Gains in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Sempra is a hidden value opportunity in the utilities sector? You are not alone. Many investors have their eyes on the numbers behind this stock. Sempra's share price has shown resilience recently, gaining 1.9% in the past week and 0.4% over the last month. Year-to-date it is up 7.6% and has gained 6.0% in the past year. Recent news headlines have focused on Sempra's continued investments in clean energy infrastructure and new regulatory developments, both of which could...

headline: Did Sempra’s (SRE) Reaffirmed 2025 Guidance Signal Resilience Amid Lower Q3 Earnings?
summary: On November 7, 2025, Sempra's board declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.645 per share, payable January 15, 2026, to shareholders of record as of December 11, 2025, and updated its full-year 2025 earnings guidance to an EPS range of US$3.05 to US$3.45, affirming long-term growth targets. The confirmation of earnings guidance and ongoing commitment to long-term growth projections stands out despite a considerable year-over-year decline in third-quarter net income and earnings per...
